availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Greenwell Johnson (Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. )

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Scott County, Kentucky, native. Son of Daniel Johnson. Married to Cynthia Jane Gardener Johnson in Scott County, Kentucky, on December 25, 1850. Father of George Johnson, Fanny Johnson, Margie A. Johnson, Edward Johnson, Mary Johnson Robey, Nancy M. Johnson Robey, and John Johnson. Laborer in Scott County in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, p. 476B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 949.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Stamping Ground District, p. 319B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Scott County Marriages, Film #000183225.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #33417.
"Mrs. Mary Robey," The Cincinnati Enquirer (Cincinnati, OH), May 4, 1938, p. 16.
"Nancy Maria Johnson Robey (1861-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial #79910345, accessed April 16, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/79910345.
